filters: #turbulenceFilters# <filter id="blurMe1"> <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="1"/> </filter> <filter id="blurMe2"> <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="2"/> </filter> <filter id="dropShadow"> <feGaussianBlur in="SourceAlpha" stdDeviation="3" result="blur"/> <feoffset in="blur" dx="4" dy="4" result="offsetBlur"/> </filter> <feMerge> <feMergeNode in="offsetBlur"/> <feMergeNode in="SourceGraphic"/> </feMerge>
